participant_1.background:
My family means the world to me.
My left knee is filled with metal.
I have 3 dogs and a parrot.
I enjoy jazz music from when i was a girl.

participant_2.background:
Sometimes i like to visit thrift shops.
I like to sew my own clothing.
I am an art teacher.
I like to upcycle my thrift shop finds and make new items.

content.text: It's nice to meet you! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to sew my own clothing and upcycle my thrift shop finds.
That's cool! I love to sew too. I've always been interested in art and fashion.
Me too! I love the creative process of designing and making clothes.
What's your favorite thing to sew?
I love to sew dresses and skirts. I find it so satisfying to see a beautiful piece of clothing come together from a pile of fabric.
I know what you mean! I love that feeling of accomplishment when you finish a project.
Me too! It's like you've created something special that you can wear and enjoy for years to come.
That's why I love sewing so much. It's a great way to express myself and create something unique.
I agree! It's a great way to relax and have some fun too.
It sure is! I'm glad we met. We should definitely sew together sometime.
I'd love to! I'm free next weekend if you are.
Perfect! I'll bring my sewing machine.
Me too! I can't wait to meet you and sew some clothes together.
